name: Epic Stick-Man BMX Dirt-Bike Motor-cycle Madness
name_original: Epic Stick-Man BMX Dirt-Bike Motor-cycle Madness
description: Awesome Stickman motocross game. 2d endless stickman motorcycle jump freestyle dirt arena action. We all love stickman games and for sure stickman sports games. In this moto x safari stickman biker game its very easy to control your bmx bike . Cool game if you like stickman skate games, stickman skateboard games, stickman base jumping games, or even stickman extreme sports games. Fun stickman racer biker dudes to unlock, choose your bike hero! Perfect game for boys, girls and good for young kids too.
